linearState.title: Evaluate replacing n8n flow with GHA script for cursor agent
linearState.description:
Evaluate replacing n8n flow with GHA script for cursor agent.

Brent Traut suggested replacing the current n8n flow with a script that GitHub Actions (GHA) calls, utilizing the new API to kick off the cursor agent.

* Assess feasibility and impacts
* Implementation plan if viable
* Update from Slack (Dec 1): Swap the n8n workflow to fire only on ambiently extracted tickets.

NEW (Standup 2025-12-02): Immediate next step for the many-stage pipeline is to run automatically. Jordan and Brent are working on browser-based runners to execute the pipeline end-to-end. Align this work with the GHA evaluation and any changes to the n8n cursor flow so we converge on one automation path.

linearState.title: Setup Dev EKS Cluster in Grapevine Account
linearState.description:
Add Kustomize overlay and comprehensive documentation for a new dedicated dev EKS cluster to enable persistent infrastructure testing.

**PR #2194**: Currently in review

* Add Kustomize overlay
* Add comprehensive documentation

linearState.title: Implement S3 Upload Workflow for Versioned JS Assets
linearState.description:
Addressing issue with whitescreen errors due to disallowed MIME types by uploading versioned static assets to AWS S3 and serving through CloudFront. This involves creating a new reusable workflow to build and upload JavaScript assets to S3 with immutable cache headers and build-date metadata.

**GitHub PR #2176**: [https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2176](https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2176) (in review)
